details.sectionContent: Use the power of hydraulics and skill to construct a bridge.

You have to construct a bascule bridge based on Hydraulic mechanism. Materials like popsicle sticks, fevicol, pins, syringe, ryles pipe, etc. will be provided to construct a bridge with Hydraulic mechanism. Participants have to design the bridge on the basis of given dimensions . The bridge should also resist against varying load.

Participants have to construct bascule bridge which works on Hydraulic mechanism. • A model will be shown at the beginning of the event. According to it they have to construct a bascule bridge of specified dimensions. • Participants have to apply Hydraulic mechanism to the bridge.The judging criteria will be based on: 1) Depending on working of Hydraulic mechanism. 2) As per height of bridge and length of deck. 3) Varying load test.
